channel.title: Duel arena again
channel.description: [i could not find a tutorial] can anyone tell me how t fix the duel arena on my server. When you accept the challenge request the only option it shows you can tick is fun weapons and it wont show the accept and decline option and when you win u stay inside the arena. also if u die u drop the item at home where u spawn instead of giving the winner the prize if u know what to do please help me out! the base is PI
